name: College of Glamour
description: Bards of the College of Glamour draw on the beguiling magic of the Feywild, weaving performances that inspire devotion, movement, and awe.

3.name: Mantle of Inspiration
3.description: As a bonus action, you expend one use of Bardic Inspiration to grant temporary hit points and allow creatures to immediately move without provoking opportunity attacks.

3.name: Enthralling Performance
3.description: After performing for at least 1 minute, you can attempt to charm humanoids who witnessed the performance.

6.name: Mantle of Majesty
6.description: As a bonus action, you assume a magically majestic presence, allowing you to cast command without expending a spell slot for 1 minute.

14.name: Unbreakable Majesty
14.description: As a bonus action, you cloak yourself in fey magic, making it difficult for enemies to strike you or approach you.
